timeline.bodyText: Does it mean you area allowing the call of time methods in the class Time ? It does not seems right. The abstract class Time should not get any access to real time

replies.bodyText: My assumption was that these classes should have direct access to Date, Calendar, System.currentTimeMillis() as they instantiate/use them. Isn't this ok?
